metadata.synopsis: Halsin just appeared in the player's camp, seeking revenge for the destruction of the grove. After fighting Halsin and his animals. the party briefly reflects on what happened. This will only occur if the players sided with Minthara and Halsin didn't die previously.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: First Druid, and now last druid. Thanks to us.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: We did what we did. Let's just see this through to the end.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: First Druid, and now last druid. Thanks to me.
